description: Enterprise-grade Error Analysis dashboard with comprehensive error tracking, root cause analysis, and trend visualization

targets.expr: ((sum(rate(app_http_requests_total{application=~"$application", environment=~"$environment", team=~"$team", status=~"[45].."}[5m])) / sum(rate(app_http_requests_total{application=~"$application", environment=~"$environment", team=~"$team"}[5m]))) - (sum(rate(app_http_requests_total{application=~"$application", environment=~"$environment", team=~"$team", status=~"[45].."}[5m] offset 1h)) / sum(rate(app_http_requests_total{application=~"$application", environment=~"$environment", team=~"$team"}[5m] offset 1h)))) / (sum(rate(app_http_requests_total{application=~"$application", environment=~"$environment", team=~"$team", status=~"[45].."}[5m] offset 1h)) / sum(rate(app_http_requests_total{application=~"$application", environment=~"$environment", team=~"$team"}[5m] offset 1h))) * 100

topk(20, sum(rate(app_http_requests_total{application=~"$application", environment=~"$environment", team=~"$team", status=~"[45].."}[5m])) by (status) / sum(rate(app_http_requests_total{application=~"$application", environment=~"$environment", team=~"$team"}[5m])) by (status))
topk(15, sum by (endpoint) (increase(app_http_requests_total{application=~"$application", environment=~"$environment", team=~"$team", endpoint!="", status=~"[45].."}[1h])))
topk(15, histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(rate(app_http_request_duration_seconds_bucket{application=~"$application", environment=~"$environment", team=~"$team", endpoint!=""}[5m])) by (le, endpoint)))
topk(20, sum(increase(app_http_requests_total{application=~"$application", environment=~"$environment", team=~"$team", endpoint!="", status=~"5.."}[1h])) by (endpoint, status))

title: Application Error Analysis Monitoring
